empty_love_response.value: Align the stars and seek the guidance of the Love Meter with "!love BabyRage "
empty_love_response.label: Empty !love command
empty_love_response.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when a user just types !love command.

love_streamer_response.value: The love $fromuser has for our beloved Dear Leader $streamername transcends all
love_streamer_response.label: !love <streamer>
love_streamer_response.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when a user types !love with the streamer name.

love_someone_response.label: !love <someone>
love_someone_response.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when a user types !love to someone.
